scripts.node-c: rm -rf node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.pod-c: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install && cd ..
scripts.ios-c: yarn node-c &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:pod:Reset
scripts.ios:ba: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev-release: yarn ios-c && yarn setDevelopment && react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:prod-release: yarn ios-c && yarn ios-ba && yarn setProduction && react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "production"
scripts.aos-ba: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.aos-ra: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.aos:dd-apk: yarn setDevelopment &&  yarn aos-c && yarn aos-ba && yarn aos-ra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:dr-apk: yarn setDevelopment &&  yarn aos-c && yarn aos-ba && yarn aos-ra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:pd-apk: yarn setProduction &&  yarn aos-c && yarn aos-ba && yarn aos-ra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:pr-apk: yarn setProduction &&  yarn aos-c && yarn aos-ba && yarn aos-ra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:pr-bundle: yarn setProduction && yarn aos-c && yarn aos-ba && yarn aos-ra && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
